pkgmetadata.longdescription: The mpss-daemon provides the Xeon Phi (Knights Corner) device management daemon and its control tool. The daemon is responsible for booting the device, capturing crash dumps, etc.

use.flag: Installs a kernel and userland image for the MIC card. Disable only if you know what you're doing!
Use MPSS MIC kernel module. Disable only if you know what you're doing!
